entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
